scripts.build: pnpm run build:types && pnpm run build:core
scripts.release:core: pnpm typecheck && pnpm lint && pnpm --filter @lilian1315/create-element exec bumpp -c 'release @lilian1315/create-element@' -t '@lilian1315/create-element@'
scripts.release:types: pnpm typecheck && pnpm lint && pnpm --filter @lilian1315/elements-writable-properties-types exec bumpp -c 'release @lilian1315/elements-writable-properties-types@' -t '@lilian1315/elements-writable-properties-types@'
